title: VR-Based Collaborative Inquiry Learning Program for Enhancing Fashion Design Creativity

context.prior_knowledge: Basic fashion design theory and practical experience, fundamental concepts of 3D modeling
context.additional_context: Team-Based Collaborative Learning Enhancement Using Smartphone-Based VR Solutions in Limited Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least three innovative fashion concepts through collaborative inquiry learning in a VR environment
Learners can produce two or more design prototypes by combining digital tools and analog techniques
Learners can improve design solutions by at least 80% based on peer feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
